languages.text: "Это вопрос не моего или вашего желания, но интересов следствия. Казнь соберет толпу, а мы соберем информацию. Учитывая, с какой прытью все разбежались, это будет полезно".

traits.locale_text: "Я терпелив. Но, как вам известно, казни всегда собирают вокруг себя толпу. А люди — это информация. Учитывая, с какой прытью все разбежались, я предпочел бы воспользоваться любой возможностью узнать это место получше".

languages.text: "It's not a question of preference, but of what might help the investigation. The execution will gather a crowd, and we in turn will gather information. That will prove useful, considering how eager everyone was to make their exit."
languages.original_text: "Это вопрос не моего или вашего желания, но интересов следствия. Казнь соберет толпу, а мы соберем информацию. Учитывая, с какой прытью все разбежались, это будет полезно".

traits.locale_text: "This isn't a matter of what you or I desire, but that of the investigation. The execution will gather a crowd, and we will gather information. That will be useful, considering how eager everyone was to make their exit."

"This isn't a matter of what you or I desire, but that of the investigation. The execution will gather a crowd, and we will gather information. That will be useful, considering how eager everyone was to make their exit."

"It's not a question of what you or I desire, but of what might help the investigation. The execution will gather a crowd, and we in turn will gather information. That will prove useful, considering how eager everyone was to make their exit."

"It's not a question of what you or I desire, but of what might help the investigation. The execution will gather a crowd, and we in turn will gather information. That will prove useful, considering how eager everyone was to make their exit."

"It's not a question of preference, but of what might help the investigation. The execution will gather a crowd, and we in turn will gather information. That will prove useful, considering how eager everyone was to make their exit."

"It's not a question of preference, but of what might help the investigation. The execution will gather a crowd, and we in turn will gather information. That will prove useful, considering how eager everyone was to make their exit."

languages.text: “这并不是出于个人爱好，而是因为这可以帮助我们收集情报。这场行刑会吸引很多人，而我们也可以借这个机会了解更多信息。考虑到每个人都急不可耐，我们一定会收获颇丰。”
languages.original_text: "It's not a question of preference, but of what might help the investigation. The execution will gather a crowd, and we in turn will gather information. That will prove useful, considering how eager everyone was to make their exit."

traits.locale_text: “这并不是出于个人爱好，而是因为这可以帮助我们收集情报。这场行刑会吸引很多人，而我们也可以借这个机会了解更多信息。考虑到每个人都急不可耐，我们一定会收获颇丰。”

languages.text: 「好みの問題ではなく、捜査の助けになるかどうかが重要なのです。処刑には人だかりができるでしょうし、それを利用して私たちも情報を集めます。皆があれほど急いで立ち去ろうとしていたことを考えれば、有用な手段になるはずです」
languages.original_text: "It's not a question of preference, but of what might help the investigation. The execution will gather a crowd, and we in turn will gather information. That will prove useful, considering how eager everyone was to make their exit."

traits.locale_text: 「好みの問題ではなく、捜査の助けになるかどうかが重要なのです。処刑には人だかりができるでしょうし、それを利用して私たちも情報を集めます。皆があれほど急いで立ち去ろうとしていたことを考えれば、有用な手段になるはずです」

languages.text: «No es una cuestión de preferencia, sino del posible beneficio para nuestra investigación. La ejecución congregará una multitud que, a su vez, nos servirá para recabar información. Será de gran utilidad, habida cuenta de lo ansiosos que parecían todos por marcharse».
languages.original_text: "It's not a question of preference, but of what might help the investigation. The execution will gather a crowd, and we in turn will gather information. That will prove useful, considering how eager everyone was to make their exit."

traits.locale_text: «No es una cuestión de preferencia, sino del posible beneficio para nuestra investigación. La ejecución congregará una multitud que, a su vez, nos servirá para recabar información. Será de gran utilidad, habida cuenta de lo ansiosos que parecían todos por marcharse».

languages.text: "Keyfi bir durum değil, soruşturmaya yardımcı olması mümkün. İdam yüzünden kalabalık toplanacak, biz de o sırada bilgi edineceğiz. Herkesin idamı seyretmek isteyeceğini düşündüğümüzde bize epey faydası dokunacak."
languages.original_text: "It's not a question of preference, but of what might help the investigation. The execution will gather a crowd, and we in turn will gather information. That will prove useful, considering how eager everyone was to make their exit."

traits.locale_text: "Keyfi bir durum değil, soruşturmaya yardımcı olması mümkün. İdam yüzünden kalabalık toplanacak, biz de o sırada bilgi edineceğiz. Herkesin idamı seyretmek isteyeceğini düşündüğümüzde bize epey faydası dokunacak."

languages.text: « Il ne s'agit pas de curiosité. Cela pourrait nous aider à faire avancer l'enquête. L'exécution attirera un grand nombre de personnes et nous pourrons alors recueillir des informations utiles. Particulièrement au vu de l'impatience de tout le monde à nous fausser compagnie. »
languages.original_text: "It's not a question of preference, but of what might help the investigation. The execution will gather a crowd, and we in turn will gather information. That will prove useful, considering how eager everyone was to make their exit."

traits.locale_text: « Il ne s'agit pas de curiosité. Cela pourrait nous aider à faire avancer l'enquête. L'exécution attirera un grand nombre de personnes et nous pourrons alors recueillir des informations utiles. Particulièrement au vu de l'impatience de tout le monde à nous fausser compagnie. »

languages.text: "Nicht meine erste Wahl, aber es könnte den Ermittlungen dienlich sein. Die Exekution wird viele Leute anlocken, von denen wir Informationen sammeln können. Das wird hilfreich sein, wenn man bedenkt, wie eilig es alle hatten, sich zu verabschieden."
languages.original_text: "It's not a question of preference, but of what might help the investigation. The execution will gather a crowd, and we in turn will gather information. That will prove useful, considering how eager everyone was to make their exit."

traits.locale_text: "Nicht meine erste Wahl, aber es könnte den Ermittlungen dienlich sein. Die Exekution wird viele Leute anlocken, von denen wir Informationen sammeln können. Das wird hilfreich sein, wenn man bedenkt, wie eilig es alle hatten, sich zu verabschieden."
